attributes.additional_details: alot of people feel strongly let down by the new goverment there are many people suffering as a result of the new goverment's actions , the sick-diabled old and young makeing peoples lives hard to live i feel as im sure many others do that we need to have a new election and to find out who the people of the uk want as there pm as david cameron was never voted in by any one i feel its in the best interest of every one that we re vote as soon as poss .
